column2: 1-1-A to HQ. Feet on the ground. Out.
1-1-A to HQ. We are at the hideout, setting for the night. Out.
1-1-A to HQ. Airbase recon complete. Over.
HQ to 1-1-A. Acknowledged. Good luck. HQ out.
HQ to 1-1-A. Roger that. Let us know if you spot any activity. HQ out.
HQ to 1-1-A. Your mission is complete. Setup camp for the night. HQ out.
